metadata.synopsis: One liner dialog when interacting with the Water Elemental at sorcerous sundries.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Interact with water elemental at CTY_Main_A -6; 26; -69

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *The water elemental appears to turn towards you, showering everything with a bracing mist.*

1.speaker: Narrator
1.text: *The water elemental's form shivers before you, a damp patina dripping off your skin.*
